locations.name: Marrakech
locations.description: The starting point, known for its vibrant Medina, souks, palaces, gardens, and lively atmosphere, offering cultural immersion and romantic experiences.

locations.name: Atlas Mountains (region/village, e.g., Imlil)
locations.description: A region offering dramatic mountain scenery, tranquility, Berber culture, and opportunities for gentle treks or relaxation amidst nature. Imlil is a common base in this area fitting the description.

locations.name: Oualidia
locations.description: A serene coastal fishing village known for its natural lagoon, oyster farms, birdlife, and tranquil beaches, providing a peaceful end to the tour.
